__e: I thought he deserved a little credit.
Right. 'Cause after one day of doing what I've done [Chuckles] forever, you think, you've earned a reward.
I guess you deserve a little...
After a lifetime of work,.. one has the right to a well-deserved rest, what the heck!
All your pre-op tests came back looking terrific, so just two more things before we get you home for some much needed rest, okay?
He ain't earned a death at my hands.
